general.start: ğŸ‘‹ Welcome! Please choose your language:
general.help:
ğŸ“¢ General commands
â€¢ /start â€” Start the bot
â€¢ /help  â€” Show this menu

ğŸ›¡ï¸ Filters and moderation
â€¢ /filters                     â€” Show current filter configuration
â€¢ /censor_on /censor_off       â€” Enable/Disable blacklist-based censorship
â€¢ /ai_censor_on /ai_censor_off â€” Enable/Disable AI-based censorship
â€¢ /antispam_on /antispam_off   â€” Enable/Disable anti-spam filters
â€¢ /blacklist_add <word>        â€” Add word to blacklist
â€¢ /blacklist_remove <word>     â€” Remove word from blacklist
â€¢ /blacklist                   â€” Show blacklist

ğŸš« Penalties and warnings
(by reply, @username or numeric user ID):
â€¢ /mute <time> @user_or_id   â€” Mute user for the given time
â€¢ /unmute @user_or_id           â€” Unmute user
â€¢ /ban <time> @user_or_id    â€” Ban user for the given time
â€¢ /unban @user_or_id            â€” Unban user
â€¢ /kick @user_or_id             â€” Kick user
â€¢ /warn @user_or_id             â€” Give warning
â€¢ /warns @user_or_id            â€” Show warnings
â€¢ /warns_reset @user_or_id      â€” Reset warnings

Format <time>: number + s, m, h or d (e.g. 30s, 10m, 2h, 1d)
